ygData.subject: RE: Rathe Mtns.
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info.  I m going to try to explore a little tonight.  I ve read somewere that there are a couple of skels that are necro pets and to touch them
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. I'm going to try to explore a little tonight. I've
read somewere that there are a couple of skels that are necro pets and to
touch them is to die. Is this area in the southeast corner where they are
located?

On another note...

Is the Login Server down? My son is home sick and can't seem to log in.
I'm at work so I don't know if he's doing anything wrong. I installed
Evermon here and tried to check, but can't connect. However, I don't know
whether this is because the server is down or Evermon won't work thru the
Company's firewall.

Thanks for all the good info on the Rathe Mtns,

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Monday, February 28, 2000 12:27 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rathe Mtns.


From: <kim@...>

On Mon, 28 Feb 2000, Perhaps a Princess... wrote:
>
> There are also giant skeletons to the left just after you come in from
> Feerott. You go through this V between two mountains, follow the right
wall
> until you get to a lizard camp. GO across the green area to the hill and
> follow that
> hill to the LEFT until you get back to the GS camp.

You've just described how to get to the hill giant area. :)

Most of the people hunting hill giants there kill the
skeletons just to get more giants to spawn. If you tell them
you'd like to hunt the skeletons, I'm sure they wouldn't mind
letting you have them all. Just be sure to learn where things
spawn and walk around. That lizard or basilisk you see
wandering around might be a hill giant next time.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
